mil.emp3.api.events

Class ContainerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.events.Event<ContainerEventEnum,IContainer>
      • mil.emp3.api.events.ContainerEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvent<ContainerEventEnum,IContainer>

    public abstract class ContainerEvent
extends Event<ContainerEventEnum,IContainer>
    This class implements an abstract Container event. It provides access to all event properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ContainerEvent(ContainerEventEnum eEvent, IContainer oTarget)
      This constructor is used by the EMP core to create the event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContainerEvent

        protected ContainerEvent(ContainerEventEnum eEvent,
                         IContainer oTarget)
        This constructor is used by the EMP core to create the event.
        Parameters:
        eEvent - ContainerEventEnum This parameter indicates the type of container event.
        oTarget - this parameter indicates the actual container in which the events has occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • getAffectedChildren

        public abstract java.util.List<IGeoBase> getAffectedChildren()
        This method retrieves a list of the children that the events refers to. If The event is an ADD, the list contains the children that were added. If its a REMOVE event the list of children that were removed.
        Returns:

      • targetIsMap
